definition: to seek investment or funding/investment promotion
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Mancheng County's investment policy preferences, relaxed environment.
sentences.chinese: 滿城縣的招商引資政策優惠，環境寬鬆。

sentences.english: The investment-inviting delegation has attracted many busi-nesspeople from Southeast Asia to Singapore to hold talks on various projects.
sentences.chinese: 招商代表團吸引了很多東南亞客商來新加坡洽商項目。

sentences.english: Long expensive also because investment promotion happens turnaround will be transferred to the town.
sentences.chinese: 長貴也由於招商的事情發生轉機要被調到鎮上。

sentences.english: Hu Xin, 25, an employee at China Merchants Bank in Guangzhou
sentences.chinese: 25歲的胡鑫來自廣州，是中國招商銀行的一名職員。

sentences.english: Reporters also learned that the second half of this year the airport will be a large-scale capital investment.
sentences.chinese: 記者還了解到，今年下半年首都機場將大規模招商。

sentences.english: More investment-funded enterprises opened a new side.
sentences.chinese: 更爲內資企業招商引資啓開了新的一面。

sentences.english: The fifth part puts forward the future strategy and route choices of Huangshi investment promotion.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分提出了新時期黃石的招商理念和路徑轉變。

sentences.english: Effective in promoting the investment of work and Jiezhen economic development.
sentences.chinese: 有效地促進了招商工作和街鎮經濟的發展。

sentences.english: In terms of tax, the investors will enjoy all the Weixian preferential policies for business invitation.
sentences.chinese: 在稅費徵收上，執行威縣招商引資的各項優惠政策。

sentences.english: The present measures shall be interpreted by the Investment Promotion Bureau of Beibei District together with relevant departments.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法由北碚區招商局會同有關部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: From China Merchants Securities and Everbright Securities information has fully proved this point.
sentences.chinese: 來自招商證券和光大證券的信息已充分證明了這一點。

sentences.english: We will afford the bundled services for projects planning and promotion.
sentences.chinese: 將提供規劃與招商同步發展的捆綁式項目服務。

sentences.english: China merchants bank credit card rules mail must fill in private E-mail.
sentences.chinese: 招商銀行信用卡規定郵件一定要填私人郵箱。

sentences.english: This marks the first investment bank with branches in Hengyang Branch.
sentences.chinese: 這標誌着招商銀行衡陽分行有了第一家分支機構。

sentences.english: Thirdly, I need to thank my employer, China Merchants development.
sentences.chinese: 第三，我要感謝招商地產，我現在工作的地方。

sentences.english: The new fast growing small and medium projects are also our favorites.
sentences.chinese: 中小型高成長性的創新項目也是我們的招商對象。

definition: Xingye county in Yulin 玉林[Yu4 lin2], Guangxi
to open a business/to open a practice/open (for business)
